item.title: The Water–Energy Nexus: The Hidden Infrastructure Of Resilience
item.description: How the water–energy nexus is emerging as the hidden infrastructure of resilience and why efficiency could be the fastest path to climate and business...

item.title: Qualcomm Readies Rack-Scale AI With New Chips And Roadmap
item.description: Qualcomm announces new chips, cards and rack-scale solutions for the AI data center, but omits key details.

item.title: Pregnancy Care Ends Too Soon. How The Postpartum System Fails Mothers.
item.description: Women often feel unsupported while postpartum, a time when they are most at risk for physical, emotional, and social challenge. Experts share how they...

item.title: Microsoft Says Windows 11 Isn’t Broken Even When Duplicate Updates Appear
item.description: With multiple recent Windows updates causing problems for users, Microsoft says that it’s safe to ignore certain updates even when duplicates appear.

item.title: ‘IT: Welcome To Derry’ Gets Early Episode 2 Release, Has 3 Season Plan
item.description: Episode 2 of IT: Welcome to Derry is airing early on HBO Max, and we now know this show wants to run for at least three seasons.
